subtitleNullable: 18 inversed static letters from LSE over a white background
descriptionNullable:
Spanish sign language has 19 static letters and 8 with movement. This dataset was captured over a white screen with a high quality camera with 3 different hands at the same approximate distance. Once captured, the dataset was revised by a person with certificated knowledge of spanish sign language. Each folder has around 100 images of the letter. 

The images are captured with a inversed perspective, like if they are recorded with the internal camera of a smartphone.
title: Spanish Sign Language Alphabet (Static)
